subject: Introducing New Hardware Collection: Timeless Style
preview: We're excited to share our new hardware collection, crafted to elevate everyday spaces with timeless style. From bold front door pulls to sleek cabinet handles, each piece blends form, finish, and fun

full_threads.body:
We're excited to share our new hardware collection, crafted to elevate everyday spaces with timeless style. From bold front door pulls to sleek cabinet handles, each piece blends form, finish, and function - including door handles, privacy locks, door stops, and hinges.

Available in refined finishes such as Aged Bronze, Brushed Gold, Brushed Nickel, Matte Black, Gunmetal, and natural stone textures like Travertine, White Onyx, and Hermes Grey Marble, this range brings quiet luxury to any project. Subtle details, lasting impressions - the perfect finishing touch.
